Frequently asked questions about AISAIC.

== Installation ==

1. Which platforms are supported by AISAIC? And what are the system requirements?

AISAIC runs on Windows, Linux, and Mac OS. Java SE 7.0 or above is required. The system memory is 4 GB or above.

== Input data ==

2. What input data are supported by AISAIC?

AISAIC can take CEL files as input.
